title: Mitterrand and the French left: A fading legacy

title: Humans are slightly more monogamous than meerkats, but slightly less than beavers

title: 'The raw and brutal display of American power in the Trump II era is finally opening the eyes of Washington's allies'
subhead: Europe finds itself in a perilous phase, having recognized its solitude but lacking the means for true autonomy, while the emotion created by the aggressiveness of empires calls for a response, writes Le Monde columnist Sylvie Kauffmann.
